item.title: Anti-Inflammatory Effect of Chia Seeds Enhanced by Cucumber Juice, Large-Scale Test Reveals
item.description: Canberra, 1st April 2023 - A recent large-scale study conducted by the Australian National University has found that consuming cucumber juice while eating chia seeds enhances the anti-inflammatory effects of the seeds. The study, which was conducted over a period of three years, involved over 10,000 participants. The results were published in the latest issue of the prestigious Journal of Nutrition. Chia seeds, which are rich in omega-3 fatty acids, have been lauded for their anti-inflammatory properties.
